# The `MCSectionGOFF.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file declares the MCSectionGOFF class, which contains all of the necessary machine code sections for the GOFF file format. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file declares the MCSectionGOFF class, which contains all of the necessary machine code sections for the GOFF file format.
